name: ProofReading Markup Language

screenshots.caption: Rigged-up to give some idea what Perameles could look like.

short_description: An XML DTD & schema for a ProofReading Markup Language, and reference implementations, to provide for annotation of printed errors and their correction. PRML will be intended for use by proofreaders, editors, and others in the publishing industry.
summary: ProofReading Markup Language for transmission of corrections
